member.summary: Gets the series associated with the data context.

member.summary: Gets the actual resolved brush in use for the item that is in context.

member.summary: Gets the item that is in context.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataContext.ItemBrush
member.summary: Gets the potential brush in usage for the item in context.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataContext.ItemLabel
member.summary: Gets the label in use for the item in context, if available.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataContext.LegendLabel
member.summary: Gets the legend label to use for the item in context, if available.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataContext.Outline
member.summary: Gets the outline in use for the item in context.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataContext.Thickness
member.summary: Gets the thickness of the item in context.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter
member.summary: Analyzes a data source and indicates which types of data visualizations might be a good fit for the data.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.GetDataProvider(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a data provider to use for the data series adapter provided a data source.
member.param: The data source to get the provider for.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a DataSeriesAdapter.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.ExcludedProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of property paths that should be exluced from consideration by the adapter.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.IncludedProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of property paths that should be included for consideration by the adapter, leaving the remaineder excluded. If null, all properties will be considered.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the backing data for the data adapter.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.SupportedSeriesTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the adapter should remove duplicate data series bound to the same member paths.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.NotifyClearItems(System.Object)
member.summary: Used to manually notify the adapter that the data source has reset/cleared its items. Only necessary if that datasource is not observable.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.NotifyInsertItem(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Used to manually notify the adapter that the data source has had an item inserted. Only necessary if that datasource is not observable.
member.param: The index of the new item

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.NotifyRemoveItem(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Used to manually notify the adapter that the data source has had an item removed. Only necessary if that datasource is not observable.
member.param: The index of the old item.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.NotifySetItem(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Used to manually notify the adapter that the data source has had an item set. Only necessary if that datasource is not observable.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Used to raise the PropertyChanged event when a property of the object has been changed.
member.param: The name of the property that was changed

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.Refresh
member.summary: Causes the DataSeriesAdapter to refresh its analysis.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Invoked when a property of the object has been changed.

member.summary: Used to invoke the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.RemovingDuplicates
member.summary: Called when the adapter is removing duplicate series from consideration.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.OnRemovingUnsupported(Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapterRunEventArgs)
member.summary: Used to invoke the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.DataSeriesAdapter.RemovingUnsupported
member.summary: Called when the adapter is removing unsupported series from consideration.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection
member.summary: Simple collection of Brush objects

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new .

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection.InterpolationMode
member.summary: Sets or gets the interpolation mode used to interpolate brushes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets a brush at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the brush to return.
member.returns: A brush for the specified index.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if a BrushCollection is equivalent to another.
member.returns: True if the BrushCollections are equivalent.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection.GetInterpolatedBrush(System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the brush at the specified index. If index is not an integer, the result of this function call will be a brush interpolated between the brushes at the previous and following index values.
member.param: The index of the brush to return.
member.returns: The brush at the specified index, or if the specified index is not an integer, an interpolated brush between the previous and next index.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection.InterpolateRandom
member.summary: Returns a random brush interpolated from the brushes in this collection.
member.returns: A random brush interpolated from the brushes in this collection.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.BrushCollection.SelectRandom
member.summary: Returns a random brush in the collection.
member.returns: A random brush in this collection.

member.summary: User gesture will not change the state of the chart.

member.summary: User gesture will start a drag rectangle to zoom the chart.

member.summary: User gesture will start a pan action to move the chart's window.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.InteractionState.Auto
member.summary: User gesture will start a pan action in a touch environment and a drag rectangle in a mouse environment.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.UnknownValuePlotting
member.summary:
Describes available methods of plotting data with unknown values in a series.
Double.NaN and null are examples of unknown values.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.UnknownValuePlotting.LinearInterpolate
member.summary: Plot the unknown value as the midpoint between surrounding known values using linear interpolation.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.UnknownValuePlotting.DontPlot
member.summary: Do not plot the unknown value on the chart.
